description: Enhanced JSON schema code snippet editing experience with temporary code editor tabs
command.editAsCode.title: Edit as Code
command.editSnippetFromHover.title: Edit Code Snippet from Hover
command.copySnippetCode.title: Copy Code Snippet
command.refreshDecorations.title: Refresh Code Snippet Decorations
command.cleanupTempFiles.title: Cleanup Temporary Files
configuration.title: JSON String Code Editor
configuration.include.description: Glob patterns for files where the extension should be active
configuration.forceCodeKeys.description: Array of key names that should always be treated as code snippets
configuration.enableLogging.description: Enable debug logging for the extension
configuration.autoCloseTempTab.descripti: Automatically close temporary tab when original file is closed
configuration.defaultLanguage.descriptio: Default programming language for temporary edit windows when language cannot be auto-detected
